Transcription for 1003166

I now will have a vocal solo by Carol Ennsley.
She will be accompanied by Jackie Zierer on the violin and Mari Wedgate on the piano.
Here I smile, here I pray, here I see, and holding her long.
I now will have a vocal solo by Carol Ennsley on the violin and Mari Wedgate on the piano.
Thank you, Carol and Jackie and Mari.
